messages.messageBody:
Hi Dana and Amber

I am a fairly new member and usually just lurk. I am way up in Point Roberts, Wa. I have to go to Bellingham to see Dr.'s, do Major shopping ect. I have 4 children.

Sheryl

"do not meddle with the affairs of dragons, for you are crunchy and good with ketchup." annon.
